title: Extreme fps drop after patch 6.22
body:
Not sure why but my fps seems to have been hit very hard by this last patch. Generally I'd hover around 220~ on uncapped. Now the game struggles to pass 40 and has some screen tearing. Might it be a client or windows problem? I've reinstalled my nvidia drivers. Not tried to repair client or reinstall league. Currently going to check if there are any problems on alpha client.

update: alpha client still low fps, putting graphics on MIN makes no effect

replies.body:
I find a solution!
It's all because alpha client.
You can leave the client and still be in game and then you will have normal fps.

> [{quoted}](name=DaJukezzz,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=eEOXRQxG,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-11-10T21:22:51.360+0000)
>
> I find a solution!
> It's all because alpha client.
> You can leave the client and still be in game and then you will have normal fps.

Please explain how to do that i honestly don't understand!{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
You just need to alt+tab when you are in game and exit the client

Yup. Running a 980m and an i7 6700, Averaging 38 fps. Using the Legacy client doesn't help. Changing CPU core affinity doesn't either. Nor does disabling Windows Gamebar (which was on, but not the root of the problem apparently). Maxing or Minning the settings does nothing as well. I've updated AND rolled back my drivers, rebooted multiple times, repaired league, and uninstall/reinstalled. SUPER frustrating, and I hope it gets patched soon.
The exact same config and issues trollstad, you're not alone :(

i7 6700 also with a gtx 1060 and getting 38 fps exactly also for a majority of my matches (no matter the settings).  Every now and then though it spikes to 200 - 300 fps.  So frustrating since my laptop runs 75 fps with BF1 and Fallout 4 perfectly fine, yet LoL can't run past 38 ever since last patch.....
Exactly! Since the new patch 6.22 my game frame rates have gone nuts :( !{{summoner:3}}
yeah same here. my laptop is very bad and i play with around 60 fps all the time but now i have 20 fps
bump. reinstalling league didn't seem to help. also system restored computer to ~week ago

I got the same issue..can you please help us?

Thanks!

Closing the client after the game loads didn't do anything for me. I'm still experiencing low fps. My system runs most modern games no problem and even if I turn graphics down it makes no difference. Just low barely playable fps. It happened when beta client installed or shortly after.

BEST SOLUTION SO FAR!

As our fellow summoner said (DaJukezzz), open league client normally enter user and password and LAUNCH (you decide what you wanna play ranked ARAM doesn't matter).
After you joined the game and game finished loading and you're on the summoners rift you gotta do this!
ALT+TAB from league of legends > Task Manager > End process Leagueclient.exe! (WARNING: there are 2 league's just close the client one)
This will keep you ingame you wont have the annoying FPS issue since the alpha is causing it unfortunately, and im looking forward for the next patch, hope Riot might fix this since its still preseason and they have time for it!

BUMP so everyone that having this problem can see this ! 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Yeah, that works but after the game ends you have to relogin again...so just delete the new client...its too early for that.its full of bugs..{{summoner:1}}

I am not sure if I have the same problem as you guys, but after the patch the games feels laggy and have gone from a running capped at 60 fps to 30 fps. I also have a GTX 970m gpu, with G-sync enabled. My problem was solved by enabling v-sync, bringing my fps back to normal. It might be worth a shot to try it out for you guys as well.
This worked! A thousand thanks, stranger.
I'm having the same issues, I've reinstalled, changed settings and disabled game bar. 38FPS max settings or min settings. BUMP :(

If you're running Windows 10 and installed some Windows updates last night (like my PC did) then those updates may have re-enabled the Windows Game Bar, which was previously causing low FPS or crashes for some players. I'd recommend following [this guide](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to ensure this feature is disabled.

Let me know the results!

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=eEOXRQxG,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-11-09T23:51:54.177+0000)
>
> If you're running Windows 10 and installed some Windows updates last night (like my PC did) then those updates may have re-enabled the Windows Game Bar, which was previously causing low FPS or crashes for some players. I'd recommend following [this guide](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to ensure this feature is disabled.
> 
> Let me know the results!

Thank you so much for posting this! FPS / Crashing problems i've been having for days are fixed now. You're a saint. Also when are you releasing the new champ President Trump?
Didnt help the problem at all submitted a ticket more then a day ago now no response.

I'm playing on a Mac so this doesn't help at all. I'm having the same problem as these guys. Reinstalled, updated computer, lowered settings, enabled administrator, nothing helped. It's the client. Please fix before Thanksgiving break

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=eEOXRQxG,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-11-09T23:51:54.177+0000)

> 
> Let me know the results!

do you know if having the Xbox app (where the game bar is from) uninstalled will automatically have the game bar turned off?
You know, I'm not 100% sure. I can't find anything that specifically states that, so you can give it a go and let me know if it works!
Thank you so much, had this problem for ages.
I am running Windows 7.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=eEOXRQxG,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-11-09T23:51:54.177+0000)

> 
> Let me know the results!

This did fix the fps issue, still having some audio lag

> [{quoted}](name=Noblesse Cadis,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=eEOXRQxG,comment-id=001b,timestamp=2017-01-24T23:40:13.144+0000)
>
> Woow what happend to league of legends... Normaly I could easly play league of legends, but now I cant play. My Fps = like 10-30 FPS...
> Normaly 120-200 FPS.. what happend to league... it not fun anymore... I quit league if they dont fix the fps issues.... 
> A lot of people quit playing league cause of the fps issues...

It's really annoying indeed, I'm thinking of quitting too cause this fucks some of my games up and I can't kite anymore with adc's, and the fast ward jumps with lee are also fucked if I get a fps drop pff

> [{quoted}](name=i luld,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=eEOXRQxG,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-11-09T18:33:25.725+0000)

> update: alpha client still low fps, putting graphics on MIN makes no effect

i have the same problem

I have also been experiencing some significant performance issues since patch 6.22. Along with fps drops, my CPU seems to be having some problems with the new patch as well. I am experiencing some input lag that you might normally associate with having a very high poll rate on a low end system. I am also experiencing audio lags (where the audio sounds like a robot), especially when one of the nexus i destroyed.

Some system specs.
Intel Core 15
Geforce 920m
12 GB RAM
Running on medium high graphics with 1600*900 resolution.

Have been able to run at 90-120 fps at these specs since i bought the computer. Now runs 60-75 fps with input lag. Have tried updating graphics drivers, defragging, lowering the in game settings, virus scans, even system restoring with no success.

On 2016-11-11 i played League Of Legends on capped 120 FPS (On uncapped i have around 210 FPS in lane). Today (2016-11-16) i launched game and i had 65-98 FPS (I even uncapped FPS but i had the same 65-98 FPS) how to fix this problem? Pls help! (Windows 7). Thanks for answer!

I've experienced the same issue and i found a fix for it.
I thought it was unusual the way the patch messed around with my frames but i went into task manager and right clicked on the League Client (ingame) and selected go to details. Then i right clicked the process highlighted and selected Set Affinity Then i unticked every processor but 1 and my frames were back to normal.{{summoner:31}}
thank you so much
This worked.
I´ve always played at 120 fps now with out changing anything my fps r 38 and with like lag. CAN´T PLAY LIKE THIS RIOT PLSsss BTW Im playing in a laptop equiped with a GTX 970m
I got the same card. Different then all my pals, and they are fine. Wonder if there is something wrong in the patch that screws up with these cards??

I'm running windows 10 and I didn't have windows updates since like early October, but I still checked Game Bar and it was off, so I don't know why I'm getting these fps drops, never happened before this patch tho
Same here, pls help
bump. same here

also people talking about turning sound off will increase fps, that is true
but problem is still persisting afterwards, after turning sounds off within next 2 seconds frame rate drops again
trust me it is not my specs, before new client my frame rate would skyrocket on uncapped to the point of lagging, so i have to cap it at 144fps, but now i barely can get past 40fps, funny thing is, sometimes after dying and respawning , my fps would go up to 50-55 on uncapped, but as soon as i die again, it dips right after
any solutions please?
internet problems? doubt it, 75mbps up and down
can not play like this, not like disturbed ghost ._. warping around every frame
also i tried both clients
tried reinstalling, repairing
This pretty much makes no sense to me,  what does you're download speed have anything to do with performance? Right nothing, + u did not post any specs so how can we know what you're running?
same here,capped on 60 and go fight or fight drake,going to 30-40,don't know what to do
Yesterday i had about 250 fps in game, today after client update i have 20 and no more no less.... how to play with that...

Same thing here, jumpy, slight strobe affect, slow, fps around 38 when it used to be uncapped. GTX 980 super computer cant play league. Sad sad day. Wiped and clean installed drivers and league with no improvement.

Same here.

it's only on lol  I tried other games and got normal fps 

but lol.. man... playing with 100-80 fps and now it's 40-20 and it's nightmare in teamfight

BUMP 

same issue here
Windows Game Bar is not the problem. Played j4 last game and died some times because of those fps drops. Its pretty annyoing if u cant time ur E+Q Combo to escape or engage...

I found a solution ,

All you have to do is to open the legacy client ( the old one ). You can do that before logining in . in the bottom right corner and under  "create an account" you'll find "Open legacy client" click it and It should open the old client .

 Everything should be fine from there . 

Like if I helped ;)

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
It didn't

"I've found a solution if you still have this problem, go to settings<video<and change full screen to borderless. It's essentially identical to full screen but it seems to have fixed the FPS issue for me."

Work for me too.

CREDIT: Toa Of Death (NA)
